original_title: Funker Vogt - Warzone K17, Live In Berlin
overview: Recorded on 26 April 2008 at Berlins K17, both DVDs feature a full concert consisting of all 22 hits from the past 12 years  a concert that was as raw, dynamic and unvarnished as weve come to know Funker Vogt. These are all original recordings, with nothing ironed out or added at the studio. Everything was recorded in top quality, filmed with 6 HD cameras plus camera crane in 5.1 surround sound. When it came to the mix, Funker Vogt put a lot of emphasis on the live atmosphere, so for the first time, the familiar Funker Vogt hits are presented on DVDs the way weve known and loved them for years. But thats not nearly all: the second DVD includes Wrestling, Shotguns, Trailer Parks, a 105-minute film, and performances at the Mera Luna festivals 2002, 2004 and 2006.
title: Funker Vogt - Warzone K17, Live In Berlin
